summary: Add JSON file size validation (10MB limit) to TodoStorage.load() to prevent DoS attacks from malicious large files
fix_approach: Minimal defensive fix: Add file size check using st_size before read_text(), raise ValueError with user-friendly message for oversized files
risks: Users with legitimate >10MB JSON files will need to migrate to multiple smaller files or increase limit via code change
File size check adds one stat() syscall per load (minimal performance impact)
limitations: Only defends against file size DoS, not JSON parsing complexity attacks (nested structures)
acceptance_criteria_met: Unit tests verify large file handling (19MB test payload)
